parameters.name: Enable
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to enable the policy. Valid values:

*   **1**: yes
*   **0**: no

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The time when the scan ends. The time must be in the HH:mm:ss format.

parameters.name: KeyPrefixList
parameters.description: The prefixes of the object that you want to check.

parameters.name: KeySuffixList
parameters.description: The suffixes of the files to scan.

parameters.name: ScanDayList
parameters.description: The days on which the scan is executed in a week.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The time when the scan starts. The time must be in the HH:mm:ss format.
